channel.title: Help With
channel.description:
Any time i try running ANY client from a .bat file, i get this error:
[code]Welcome to Galkons Pride Client! Made by Galkon Credits to IceMan, google Members, and Gliomaru Join forums http://galkonspride.ipbfree.com Exception in thread "main" java.lang.UnsupportedClassVersionError: Bad version n umber in .class file at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass1(Native Method) at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass(Unknown Source) at java.security.SecureClassLoader.defineClass(Unknown Source) at java.net.URLClassLoader.defineClass(Unknown Source) at java.net.URLClassLoader.access$100(Unknown Source) at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClassInternal(Unknown Source) Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
Nobody seems to be able to help me whereever i post... Im hoping someone here has SOME knowledge on clients and is able to help me...

item.title: Help With
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Try to uninstall it and reinstall it

and uninstalling java and dling it again.

or just use a different client.

Read full topic

item.title: Help With
item.dc:creator: @black_starre black starre
item.description:
@black_starre wrote:

yae i dont know why that keeps happening either, its happening to me too and nobody seems to know that error and nobody can help me either, ive asked a bunch of my friends and im still asking, if i find out ill post here and see if i can help ya

Read full topic
